content:
Hi Marco

You don't need to delete the account.

Navigate to the below setting pages where you can change the password.

Settings > account > fetching mail > incoming server Settings > account > sending mail > outgoing server
creator: platform34

content: Do you have "Lucie Payant" listed in your android contacts list with the corresponding email address. It's the only place Thunderbird would pull the Avatar picture from.
creator: platform34

content: Thanks. Yes, I have "Lucie Payant" in my list of Android contacts, with my email address. What should I do?
creator: raymondrancourt

content:
Remove your email address from the "Lucie Payant" android contact. If you want to store your email address in the android contacts list, add it to a contact entry with your own name.

If you don't need or use Thunderbird's contact lookup feature, you can turn it off in the apps general settings > display page.
creator: platform34
